title: How can I use SES to receive emails and store them?
description:
Find more details in the AWS Knowledge Center: https://amzn.to/2BvoRV0
Ryan, an AWS Cloud Support Engineer, shows you how to use Amazon Simple Email Service to receive emails and store them.

title: Getting Started with Amazon SES - Simple Email Service on AWS
description: Learn how to get started with Amazon Simple Email Service (SES), a cost-effective, outbound email service. Amazon SES is a reliable, scalable way to send business email & marketing messages. Learn more - http://amzn.to/2iZRPT5.

title: Webinar 2012: Using SMTP with Amazon Simple Email Service (SES)
description:
Learn how to use Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES) with Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP) support. Amazon SES is highly scalable and cost-effective bulk and transactional email-sending service. Learn more: http://amzn.to/2hZRFJP

You will learn how to: 
• Create your Amazon SES SMTP credentials 
• Discover and use SMTP settings 
• Configure SMTP and Amazon SES with some common programs 

Recorded on January 19, 2012

title: Introduction to Amazon Simple Email Service
description: Amazon SES is a scalable and cost-effective bulk and transactional email-sending service.

title: Chris Wheeler, Amazon Simple Email Service
description: Chris Wheeler Technical Program Manager of Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) talks to Jeff Barr about how to get started with SES and how to move from the SES sandbox to production.

title: Webinar: Using Domain Verification with Amazon Simple Email Service
description:
In this webinar, you'll learn how to: 
• Verify your domains in Amazon SES 
• Use the simple Amazon Route 53 integration to verify your domains 
• Remove verified domains
Presented by Jenn Steele, Amazon SES Product Manager.
Learn more: http://aws.amazon.com/ses/

title: AWS re:Invent 2014 | (SDD412) Amazon Simple Email Service Deep Dive and Best Practices
description: Almost all applications and services have a need to communicate over email. Amazon Simple Email Service (SES) enables email functionality that will scale with your business. So what should an email-sending application that integrates with SES look like? In this session we cover common patterns, architectures, and best practices that you can use to build a robust email solution that takes advantage of the SES platform.

title: How do I track an email I sent using Amazon SES?
description:
Find more details in the AWS Knowledge Center: https://amzn.to/2OVLZTe
Apoorv, an AWS Cloud Support Engineer, shows you how to track an email sent using Amazon Simple Email Service.

title: Amazon Simple Email Service Management Console
description: Watch this webinar to get an overview of Amazon Simple Email Service.

title: Can I verify my Domain in multiple AWS Simple Email Service Accounts or Regions?
description:
For more details see the Knowledge Center article with this video:  https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/ses-verify-domain-accounts-regions/
Ajinkya shows you how to verify your Domain in multiple AWS SES Accounts or Regions.

title: How do I verify an email address or domain in SES?
description:
Find more details in the AWS Knowledge Center: https://amzn.to/2CSPA19
Ryan, an AWS Cloud Support Engineer, shows you how to verify an email address or domain in SES.

title: Webinar: Handling Bounces and Complaints with Amazon Simple Email Service
description:
Learn about the Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES) feature: bounce & complaint notifications. Now, as an alternative to parsing bounces and complaints passed back to your mailbox, you can set an Amazon SNS topic for bounce or complaint notifications by verified domain or email address and receive them in a simple JSON format. Learn to set up notifications, manage feedback mechanisms and interpret JSON objects. Presented by Jenn Steele, Rohan Deshpande and Chris Wheeler.

Learn more:http://aws.amazon.com/ses/#functionality

title: AWS for Microsoft Workloads: Integrate Amazon Simple Email Service into your .NET Application
description:
For more information, visit the AWS for Microsoft Workloads Self-Study Guide at - https://amzn.to/2yt3yWe.
If you wish to send email from within your .Net application then integrating into the AWS Simple Email Service is a good way to go. In this video, you will learn how to send email from C# utilizing AWS SES.

title: AWS re: Invent SVC 103: Using Amazon Simple Email Service
description: If you're already building your website our application on AWS, using Amazon SES is a quick and cost-effective way to send your email. This session will talk about what Amazon SES is and why you would want to use it. Then we will dig into the most common ways our customers use Amazon SES with their current systems and give you the tools you need to do the same.  Learn more:  http://aws.amazon.com/ses/

title: From 0 to 100M+ Emails Per Day: Sending Email with Amazon SES (SVC301) | AWS re:Invent 2013
description: It's difficult to imagine an app without email. When you integrate Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES), you not only increase your productivity and add richness to your application but also enhance your ability to scale your application to new heights. But how do you scale the service as you grow your application? In this session, we will tell you a story and weave all the best practices of sending high volume email such as basic inbox placement, high throughput pipeline to email ISPs, message signing, and retries in the face of temporary failures on how to scale up your application to best take advantage of what Amazon SES can do for your business.

title: How do I configure SES and SNS to receive domain validation emails?
description:
Find more details in the AWS Knowledge Center: https://aws.amazon.com/premiumsupport/knowledge-center/ses-sns-domain-validation-email/

Prabhakaran, an AWS Cloud Support Engineer, shows you how to configure SES and SNS to receive domain validation emails.

title: Webinar: Email Best Practices from the Amazon SES Team
description:
To run a successful email program, you must be aware of a few topics that can affect your delivery and ultimately your impact on email recipients. In this webinar, you'll learn about the value attributed to your email by your recipients and the Internet Service Providers (ISPs) responsible for protecting their in-boxes; what the emailing process looks like, who's involved, and what their roles are; how to optimize value and drive it up based on some best practices we've compiled. Learn more: http://aws.amazon.com/ses/

Presented by: Chris Wheeler, Senior Technical Program Manager and moderated by Nick Hristov, Email Deliverability Manager

title: NewsLeopard: How to Build an eDM Service with a High Delivery Rate on AWS (Mandarin)
description:
NewsLeopard built their mail delivery service on AWS. They not only built up an effective pipeline for Simple Email Service (SES) for mass delivery, they also built up a tracking mechanism with API Gateway and Lambda. This provides their customers with a reliable channel to understand their eDM operations.

Subscribe: 
More AWS videos http://bit.ly/2O3zS75 
More AWS events videos http://bit.ly/316g9t4

#AWS

title: AWS re:Invent 2017: Building Scalable Multitenant Email Sending Programs with Amazon (ARC210)
description: Many companies use Amazon Simple Email Service (Amazon SES) to build applications that enable their users to send millions of emails every day. In this session, you learn how to build applications using the scalable, reliable Amazon SES infrastructure. You also learn how to monitor email sending and enforce compliance rules on individual accounts without impacting other accounts. Zendesk discusses the architecture of its multitenant email sending platform, the historical challenges it faced, its phased approach to platform migration, and the ways Amazon SES helped them meet their goals.
